Articles.Content:
Just some mod that makes some of the information on right-click that you get when the debug options are on always there without having to go into debug. 

And maybe a button on screen to toggle the visual display of heat and forces without going into debug. 

See here [http://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez/v/4370369?t=4h57m07s](http://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez/v/4370369?t=4h57m07s)
